perk_name: 10% Off  Revivify Facial Moisturizers Intro Kit
description:
This kit includes our wonderful facial day (1 oz) and night (1 oz) anti-age moisturizers. Each formula is suffused with essential oils that work cosmetically as an anti-aging agent in a base of Shea Butter and Jojoba oil. Our cream stimulates skin cells to reproduce quickly which reduces the time between new skin growth and the elimination of old cells, prevents congestion of toxic debris by improving the lymphatic flow and general circulation which aids oxygenation and energizes the dermis. Fennel seed oil, which contains hormonal-like properties firms the skin giving it a youthful appearance and acts as a bactericide by neutralizing unfriendly bacteria and prevents blemishing conditions. Revivify is stimulating, detoxifying and balancing. Allow at least 30 days to see outward improvement. Though many of our customers say they see improvement withing a few days. For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.

To redeem this offer, please order on line and use Promo code:   734Passperks.  This offer is not valid in combination with any other offers or discounts.  You must order on line to receive this discount.
